version_description:
We are so excited to present the new version of our app with many extremely useful improvements we hope you will love! 

List of new features: 
----------------- 
+Ability to save images to Camera Roll 
+Direct search for images
+A new quick way to select service for search in
+Long tap on link in the browser will enable to add it to Reading List 
+Pull-to-refresh to reload webpage or widget 
+Ability to send all links from Reading List to email 
+One-tap copy/past action for address bar in browser 
+Highlighted links in the suggestions list 
+Internal notifications are shown on the app icon 
+Quick access to the widgets from visual history window 
+Additional actions for interaction with custom bookmarks (move, hide, delete) 
+A clearer design for control buttons 
+A handy button to submit search query 
+Optimized loading of widgets to reduce mobile traffic 

Also we updated bookmarks and fixed minor bugs.

These significant changes were possible only on newer versions of iOS, so now we support devices iOS 5.0 or higher. 

At the end
---------
Thank you again for using this app!
We are doing our best to develop the most powerful app which helps you search and surf the Web fast and productive.

You are welcome to help us continue supporting and improving this amazing free app via Donation widget, which we added into this version!

Hello!
Here we are again ready to make you happy with the next version of this wonderful application.

WHAT'S NEW IN THIS VERSION
-------------------------
1) "Open in New Page" functionality in the browser window.
* Press and hold the desired link to see additional menu
* To switch between pages just swipe from the left or right edge of the window
* Long press on the thumbnail of saved webpage in the visual history will open it in a new page

2) Improved functionality of visual history.
* All last visited pages are now stored in the visual history instead of saving just individual sites.
* Now you can open search results window from Visual History window too

3) Added the possibility to return to the last open page from the search results window by swiping from the right edge of the screen.

4) Added the ability to share any link from the Reading  List without opening it in the browser.

5) Improved no connection screen 

6) Refreshed the design of the app and icon retaining the familiar design of interface buttons.

ADDITIONAL IMPROVEMENTS
------------------------
+ Fixed an issue with turning off music after launch of the app
+ Application state time increased
+ Increased the distance between the buttons within the input field to make it easier to tap :)
+ Status bar added in full-screen mode to see connection status and network activities
+ For funs of gestures we made ​​an ability to use swipe  from the edges to move within app windows
+ Updated the design of some widgets and accelerated their loading
+ Improved overall performance and reliability of the app

WHAT TO EXPECT IN THE NEXT VERSIONS
----------------------------------
* Voice input
* Privacy settings
* Protection from fraudulent sites
* Download Manager
* Widgets on the home screen

AT THE END
----------
Thanks for your feedback and comments.
Thanks for the good reviews in App Store! Write more :)

Tell your friends about this app and we will continue to make the most user-friendly mobile browser in the world!

+ Added auto full-screen mode in the browser when the screen is rotated to the horizontal mode.
(can be disabled in the settings)

+ Added new feature to open a new blank window (the "+" button from the window of visual bookmarks)

+  Fixed a bug that prevented correct purchasing of switching off ad banners from the Settings window

+ Fixed bad reading headers in SMS/Email sharing window

+ Improved overall speed and reliability of the app

Thank you for using this app! 
Don't forget to share it with your friends and we will continue developing this amazing app.

In this version we fixed several bugs we had learned from your emails.

We've been working hard to make this app as reliable as possible. So if you came across with a bug in the app, please write us more details to email: info@smartsearchapp.com
It will help us to find and fix it faster.

Improvements in previous version:
– full support for iOS 8
– screen optimization for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
– beautiful iOS 8 widget for "Today" screen
– automatic cleanup cache for temporary files
– other useful internal improvements

Don't forget to rate and post your new review of the app on the App Store. 
Thank you so much!

Stay with us and enjoy browsing the Web with this amazing app!

Thank you for your comments and high ratings on the App Store that help us to maintain and develop the app! We try to make it better and more useful with every update.

+ Now you can share links to other apps like WhatsApp, Telegram, Pocket & etc.
+ Keyboard opens automatically after creating a new tab from visual history
+ More supported regions for iOS 8 widget for "Today" screen
+ Fixed a bug with returning to previous webpage from "Check network connection" screen
+ Fixed a bug with the address bar which could led to lost of entered URL
+ Optimized access to websites from catalog using "+" button
+ Updated font of tutorial screens on iPhone 4/4s/5/5s
+ Added link to AliExpress online shop to Speed Dial
+ Optimized size of the app to save your phone memory
+ Improved stability and performance
+ Tested and optimized working of the app on iOS 9

More amazing features to come in the next versions! Stay with us and enjoy the app!

Don't forget to rate and post your new review of the app on the App Store.

As we promised we've prepared for you another tasty update :)

+ Full support of iOS 9
+ Quick access to your favorite bookmarks or your recent queries straight from Spotlight search
+ Customization of search services list + additional search services like DuckDuckGo and iMDB
+ 3D Touch support for iPhone 6S – touch the icon and get quick access to new search and first bookmarks from Speed Dial of the app
+ New style of the app icon
+ Access to the settings of the app from menu Actions of browser window
+ Improved visibility of recent queries by highlighting with color and underlining URLs 
+ FoxNews, SkyNews and Groupon added in catalog of popular websites
+ Fixed several bugs and again we improved performance and stability 

Enjoy this new version and stay with us!

If you came across with a bug in the app, please write us more details to email: support@smartsearchapp.com
It will help us a lot to find and fix the bug as fast as it possible.

Don't forget to rate and post a review of the app on the App Store.
 
Thank you so much!

We continue our way of developing perfect Web browser for iPhone :)
Update the app to get new useful improvements:

+ Search on page (use special button of menu Actions) 
+ Reading text aloud in readability mode (see "speaker" button on top)
+ Auto fullscreen mode while scrolling pages (see special option in Settings)
+ Progress bar of loading webpage in fullscreen mode
+ Active bottom back button for returning search results window
+ Quick way to return to the main screen using "long tap" on back button of browser window
+ Notification about availability new version of the app on App Store
+ Notifications with useful tips how to use all features of the app
+ Less empty thumbnails of visited websites in visual history
+ Fixed opening wrong URLs in readability mode
+ Some improvements in design
+ Improved performance and stability 

Enjoy this new version and stay with us!

If you came across with a bug in the app, please write us more details to email: support@smartsearchapp.com
It will help us a lot to find and fix the bug as fast as it possible.

If you like this app, please rate it and post a review on the App Store.
 
Thank you so much!

And we are ready again to present you the next update of the app you so patiently have been waiting for!

WHAT'S NEW IN THIS VERSION
-------------------------
1) Updated design for iOS7:
+clean style of icon
+habitual eye interface elements of iOS7
+light fonts
+improved window of visual history
+extended "Actions" menu in the browser window

2) Video and audio playback in the background with AirPlay mode support

3) The ability to share any link from the Reading List by  long tap on the item

CHANGES AND IMPROVEMENTS
--------------------------
+Changed the direction of movement of the visited sites in visual history (first item in the list is the most recent site)

+To remove an item from the visual history just swipe up or down

+Fixed a bug caused empty screenshots of sites in the visual history window

+A lot of things have been improved to make the app works reliable in iOS7 and iOS6 as well

+We also keep supporting native interface design for previous versions of iOS (5.x and 6.x)

WHAT TO EXPECT FROM THE NEXT VERSION
-------------------------------------
*Voice input
*Opening links in separate window
*Advanced settings for browsing

AND FINALLY
-----------
Thank you for being with us! Thanks for your feedback and comments. Thanks for the inspiration!

Tell friends about the application, please write us your suggestions and wishes to info@smartsearchapp.com and together we will make the most convenient mobile browser in the world!
